title: Chocolate Cookie Buttercream Frosting Recipe
description: Creamy frosting that tastes great on cookies or bars, especially Chocolate Cookies.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Desserts Frostings and Icings Cookie Frosting Chocolate Cookie Buttercream Frosting 4.6 (358) 298 Reviews 64 Photos Creamy chocolate frosting that tastes great on cookies or bars, especially chocolate cookies. Submitted by Nancy Dorman Updated on November 2, 2022 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 64 64 64 64 Prep Time: 10 mins Total Time: 10 mins Servings: 24 Yield: 3 cups Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 24 servings ¼ cup butter 2 cups confectioners' sugar 3 tablespoons cocoa powder 1 teaspoon vanilla extract 2 tablespoons milk Directions Mix together all ingredients. May need to add more milk (slowly) until frosting reaches a spreadable consistency. Spread on chocolate cookies or other treats of your choice. Enjoy! I Made It Print 493 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 59 Calories 2g Fat 10g Carbs 0g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 24 Calories 59 % Daily Value * Total Fat 2g 3% Saturated Fat 1g 7% Cholesterol 5mg 2% Sodium 14mg 1% Total Carbohydrate 10g 4% Dietary Fiber 0g 1% Total Sugars 10g Protein 0g 0% Calcium 3mg 0% Iron 0mg 1% Potassium 20mg 0% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Chocolate Cookie Buttercream Frosting 01 of 64 Photo by  Allrecipes Member 02 of 64 Photo by  Dorothyann Ambrosio-Bernal 02/10/2021 03 of 64 Photo by  tiffanyandersen 04/28/2020 04 of 64 Photo by  Anne 02/16/2019 Super creamy and easy! I doubled the recipe for 24 cupcakes. I didn’t have milk so I substituted heavy whipping cream. 05 of 64 Photo by  GRETA SHOCKEY 01/30/2019 06 of 64 Photo by  Stugroupie 03/14/2018 This is really delicious! So yummy that I licked the beaters! I made it as is to start. The frosting was too thick for my purpose so I added another Tbsp of milk. It was the perfect amount for my 13x9 pan of brownies. Thanks! 07 of 64 Photo by  Marcikr 11/23/2017 08 of 64 Photo by  Eclarner 08/05/2016 Great! Whipped this up in a jiffy and used it to fill macarons. It took less than 30 seconds with the paddle attachment on my stand mixer. 09 of 64 Photo by  thedailygourmet 05/02/2016 Not too sweet, and this has a great piping consistency. I used it on the brown eyed Susan's cookie recipe, and topped with sprinkles. 10 of 64 Photo by  thedailygourmet 05/02/2016 Not too sweet, and this has a great piping consistency. I used it on the brown eyed Susan's cookie recipe, and topped with sprinkles. 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Gingerbread Cupcakes with Cream Cheese Frosting 149 Ratings Royal Icing 284 Ratings Chocolate Butter-Creme Frosting 273 Ratings Perfect and Delicious Royal Icing 15 Ratings Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Frosting 39 Ratings Quick Chocolate Frosting 192 Ratings Strawberry-Chocolate Mini Cupcakes with White Chocolate Ganache 6 Ratings Chocolate Cupcakes with Caramel Frosting 85 Ratings Chocolate Truffle Cookies 670 Ratings Peanut Butter Brownies II 81 Ratings Carrot Cupcakes with White Chocolate Cream Cheese Icing 561 Ratings Layers Of Love Chocolate Brownies 32 Ratings Cheesecake Brownies 794 Ratings Dawn's Easy Red Velvet Sandwich Cookies 158 Ratings Nutella Cookies 103 Ratings Mint Buttercream Frosting With Dark Chocolate Glaze 89 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: Nancy Dorman
instructions: Mix together all ingredients. May need to add more milk (slowly) until frosting reaches a spreadable consistency. Spread on chocolate cookies or other treats of your choice. Enjoy!
